27#ifndef _UTILS_H
28#define _UTILS_H
29
30#pragma ident "%Z%%M% %I% %E% SMI"
31
32#include <stdarg.h>
33
34#ifdef __cplusplus
35extern "C" {
36#endif
37
38#define E_SUCCESS 0 /* Exit status for success */
39#define E_ERROR 1 /* Exit status for error */
40#define E_USAGE 2 /* Exit status for usage error */
41
42extern void vwarn(const char *, va_list) __printflike(1, 0);
43extern void warn(const char *, ...) __printflike(1, 2);
44extern void vdie(const char *, va_list) __printflike(1, 0) __dead;
45extern void die(const char *, ...) __printflike(1, 2) __dead;
46
47extern const char *getpname(void);
48
49#ifdef __cplusplus
50}
51#endif
52
53#endif /* _UTILS_H */
54
